files.tests.test_database module¶

class files.tests.test_database.FileInfoModelTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: TestCase

A test case for the FileInfo model.

setUp()[source]¶

Set up a test FileInfo instance for use in test methods.

test_file_info_calculated_field()[source]¶

Test that calculated fields, such as ‘area’ for image, have the correct values.

test_file_info_creation()[source]¶

Test the creation of a FileInfo instance.

test_file_info_deletion()[source]¶

Test deleting a FileInfo instance.

test_file_info_field_defaults()[source]¶

Test that fields not explicitly set use their default values.

test_file_info_filtering()[source]¶

Test filtering FileInfo instances based on a field value.

test_file_info_null_values()[source]¶

Test the handling of null values for optional fields.

test_file_info_str_method()[source]¶

Test the string representation of a FileInfo instance.

test_file_info_update()[source]¶

Test updating a FileInfo instance and saving the changes.

files.tests.test_logic module¶

class files.tests.test_logic.IndianaTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: TestCase

A test case for validating the functionality of the Indiana class.

setUp()[source]¶

Set up a temporary directory and file for testing.

Initializes an instance of the Indiana class with the temporary directory as its search path and prepares a GeneralResearcher instance for supplementary operations.

tearDown()[source]¶

Clean up the temporary directory and any generated files after tests complete.

test_find_loot()[source]¶

Test the find_loot method to ensure it discovers files in the specified directory.

test_save_results()[source]¶

Test the save_results method to ensure it writes the discovered files data to a CSV file.

Verifies the existence of the output CSV file after the save_results method is called.
